com.vectorprint.configuration.binding

Class BindingHelperImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vectorprint.configuration.binding.BindingHelperImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BindingHelper
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ParamBindingHelperImpl

    public class BindingHelperImpl
extends Object
implements BindingHelper
    Responsible for converting Strings into (atomic) values and vise versa and for escaping meaningful characters for a certain syntax. Use this default implementation in AbstractBindingHelperDecorator.AbstractBindingHelperDecorator(com.vectorprint.configuration.binding.BindingHelper) when extending it. Threadsafe: it is safe to call the available methods from different threads at the same time on one instance of this class.
    Author:
    Eduard Drenth at VectorPrint.nl
    See Also:
    StringConverter
